channel.title: STEAM account?
channel.description:
I have steam accounts, My brother recently sold his gaming place, He let me keep all the accounts.
I wanna know if anyone would be interested in buying them.
Some accounts have $120+ worth of games.....
If you wanna discuss this, MSN = duke_7_@hotmail.com

item.title: STEAM account?
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Re-read the rules; it says quite clearly no selling of anything except for SCAR scripts.

Read full topic
